name: On The Water
description:
ON THE WATER

On the water, you are a light that has to advance through the depths of a polluted and polluted sea to reach the temple of water where you can sacrifice yourself to purify the sea.

Currently only has one level and is created as an outline of ideas and mechanics that will be implemented later.

Approximate duration of 2 minutes.

-Adventure
-Plataform
-One hit kill
-UnderWater
